proposal1.heroHeadline: Shida loses 200 hours annually on proposal creation. This is why.
proposal1.heroSubheadline: Currently, proposals drain Shida's time with manual effort. Generate them in 47 seconds with AI.
proposal1.problemsIntro: These are the ongoing losses Shida faces without automation.

problems.title: Time Black Hole
problems.description: Every hour spent crafting proposals is an hour not spent designing for clients. Shida's team loses 50 hours a month this way.

problems.title: Lost Deals
problems.description: Delayed proposals mean missed opportunities. Shida risks losing 2 potential clients monthly due to slow response times.

problems.title: Revenue Drain
problems.description: Inefficient proposal processes cost Shida approximately $20,000 in lost revenue annually. Each delayed proposal bleeds potential income.

problems.title: Team Burnout
problems.description: Manual proposal creation exhausts your small team. This impacts creativity and leads to 15% reduced productivity in core design tasks.

problems.title: Client Dissatisfaction
problems.description: Inconsistent proposals create a poor first impression, costing Shida repeat business. This results in decreased client retention by 10%.

problems.title: Brand Inconsistency
problems.description: Manually generated proposals risk inconsistent branding. This leads to a 5% decrease in brand trust and recognition among prospects.

proposal1.solutionIntro: Our AI system replaces these costly inefficiencies with precision and speed.

solutions.title: Instant Proposals
solutions.description: Currently, proposals take hours to draft manually. Our system generates them in under 60 seconds.

solutions.title: Brand Consistency
solutions.description: Manual processes risk off-brand proposals. Our AI ensures every proposal aligns perfectly with Shida's brand.

solutions.title: Improved Client Engagement
solutions.description: Currently, slow proposals lead to lost prospects. Our system's speed enhances client engagement and retention.

solutions.title: Reduced Workload
solutions.description: Manual work exhausts your team. Automation frees up 40 hours monthly for creative projects.

solutions.title: Real-time Tracking
solutions.description: Currently, Shida lacks insight into proposal status. Our AI tracks interactions, providing valuable insights.

proposal1.whyUsIntro: Four reasons this works. Not marketing claims. Engineering facts.

whyUsCards.title: Speed
whyUsCards.description: Every hour your team spends writing proposals is an hour not spent closing deals. This system gives those hours back. Lead data in, live proposal out, 60 seconds.

whyUsCards.title: Personalization
whyUsCards.description: Generic proposals get ignored. Personalized proposals close. The system reads each prospect's website and reflects their services, tone, and positioning back to them. Written from scratch, not templated.

whyUsCards.title: Ownership
whyUsCards.description: No monthly subscription bleeding your budget. No vendor deciding to raise prices or shut down. You own the source code, the infrastructure, and the data. Permanently.

whyUsCards.title: Support
whyUsCards.description: Personal onboarding, a video walkthrough your team can reference anytime, and one week of post-delivery support. You are not left figuring this out alone.

fearCards.title: You are probably thinking: our stack is complicated.
fearCards.sub: CRM, email, Sheets, Slack. The system connects to whatever you already use. No migration.

fearCards.title: You might be wondering if this breaks your current workflow.
fearCards.sub: It runs alongside everything you have. Nothing changes except the time you spend on proposals.

fearCards.title: You are concerned the output will not match your standards.
fearCards.sub: Revisions are part of the build. We configure, test, and refine until the output matches your bar exactly.

proposal1.teamIntro: Your point of contact. No handoffs, no account managers, no layers.

team.name: Ayush Chauhan
team.bio: Full-stack engineer specializing in AI automation for agencies and service businesses. Every engagement personally handled from architecture through deployment. 15+ systems built. Zero failed deliveries. Works async, ships fast.

proposal1.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Kickoff (Async or Call)
process.description: We map your workflow, services, and current proposal process. Can be a 15-minute call or handled entirely over email. By the end, we have everything needed to configure the system.

process.title: System Configuration
process.description: The engine gets configured with your services, pricing structure, tone of voice, and brand standards. Every proposal it generates will sound like your best strategist wrote it.

process.title: Build and QA
process.description: Test proposals generated and reviewed against your quality bar. Refinements continue until the output is indistinguishable from what your team produces manually.

process.title: Deployment and Handoff
process.description: Deployed to production with full infrastructure. You receive a video walkthrough, documentation, and complete source code. From this point, the system runs without us.

proposal1.pricingIntro: Two options. Both are one-time builds. No subscriptions, no recurring fees. You own the source code and infrastructure permanently.

pricing.name: Proposal Engine
pricing.subtitle: // Core System
pricing.description: Custom proposal automation configured for Shida's services, voice, and pricing structure.

pricing.name: Engine + AI Chatbot
pricing.subtitle: // Recommended
pricing.description: Everything above, plus an AI sales assistant embedded in every proposal. Handles objections, answers questions, and books calls for Shida around the clock.
features: AI chatbot on every proposal page

proposal1.ctaHeadline: See this running on your actual proposals.
proposal1.ctaDescription: Reply here or email Ayush directly. He will send the onboarding form. Takes about 10 minutes and the build starts the same day. Custom-configured for Shida.

proposal2.heroHeadline: Transform Acme Corp's Visual Identity with Shida's Expert Design Services.
proposal2.heroSubheadline: We will revitalize your brand with a strategic design overhaul, ensuring every interaction with your brand is memorable and engaging.
proposal2.problemsIntro: Right now, Acme Corp is experiencing significant losses due to unoptimized design elements.

problems.title: High Bounce Rate
problems.description: Every visitor who leaves your site without engaging is potential revenue lost. A 40% bounce rate could mean thousands in missed opportunities monthly.

problems.title: Brand Inconsistency
problems.description: Inconsistent branding across platforms confuses customers and dilutes brand value. This can result in a 20% decrease in customer trust.

problems.title: Poor Visual Appeal
problems.description: A design that fails to captivate can lead to a 30% drop in customer retention. Each customer lost is future revenue forfeited.

problems.title: Ineffective Messaging
problems.description: Messaging that doesn't resonate can reduce conversion rates by 25%. This is revenue walking out the door.

problems.title: Slow Design Iteration
problems.description: Delayed design updates can stall marketing efforts, costing potential sales. A two-week delay might mean a 15% drop in campaign effectiveness.

problems.title: Lack of Engagement
problems.description: Without engaging content, user interaction drops. A 50% decrease in engagement could mean a significant loss in marketing ROI.

proposal2.solutionIntro: Our solutions directly address these losses, positioning Acme Corp for growth.

solutions.title: Brand Identity Design
solutions.description: We refine your visual identity to ensure consistency and appeal, strengthening brand recognition and trust.

solutions.title: Website Redesign
solutions.description: Our redesign improves user experience, reducing bounce rates and increasing engagement.

solutions.title: Graphic Design Services
solutions.description: We create visually captivating graphics that enhance messaging and drive conversions.

solutions.title: Content Strategy
solutions.description: We develop a content strategy that resonates with your audience, boosting engagement and conversions.

proposal2.whyUsIntro: Shida stands out through exceptional design and strategic insights.

whyUsCards.title: Proven Expertise
whyUsCards.description: With years of experience, we deliver designs that drive results.

whyUsCards.title: Attention to Detail
whyUsCards.description: Our meticulous approach ensures every design element serves a purpose.

whyUsCards.title: Client-Centric Approach
whyUsCards.description: We prioritize your goals, tailoring solutions to your unique needs.

whyUsCards.title: Innovative Solutions
whyUsCards.description: We bring fresh ideas that keep your brand ahead of the competition.

proposal2.teamIntro: Meet the team driving your success.

team.name: Kenji Doshida
team.bio: Kenji leads our strategic direction and ensures client relationships are prioritized. His experience in design and strategy is unmatched.

proposal2.processIntro: What Working With Us Looks Like

process.title: Discovery & Planning
process.description: We conduct a thorough analysis of your current design and business goals.

process.title: Design & Development
process.description: We create design prototypes and gather feedback for refinement.

process.title: Implementation
process.description: We bring designs to life, ensuring seamless integration with existing systems.

process.title: Launch & Review
process.description: We launch your new design and conduct a post-launch review.

proposal2.pricingIntro: Choose from our tailored investment options for optimal outcomes.

pricing.name: Essential Package
pricing.description: Basic design services to get you started.

pricing.name: Growth Package
pricing.description: Comprehensive design services for growing businesses.

pricing.name: Premium Package
pricing.description: Advanced services for established brands seeking innovation.

proposal2.ctaDescription: Explore how we can elevate your business with a no-obligation conversation.

lead.company_description: From branding to custom websites and everything in between, Shida Studio is your one-stop shop for all your graphic design needs. Our team of professionals will keep you informed and involved throughout the entire process. Consider us an extension of your own 'in-house' design department.
